item.title: Ctypes
item.description: get methods from a dll C:\Users\chiching\AppData\Local\Programs\Common\Microsoft\Visual C++ for Python\9.0\VC\bin>link.exe /dump /exports d:/xfic2.dll the result is something like this: ordinal hint RVA name 1 0 0000100F ??4CIcDllwd@@QAEAAV0@ABV0@@Z 2 1 00001028 _CardAdd@8 3 2 0000145B _CardPassAll@8 4 3 00001366 _ClearData@12 5 4 000012D0 _CloseCom@0 6 5 00001483 _CmdClearAdmin@0 or use Depends software to check it. or….. C:\Users\chiching\AppData\Local\Programs\Common\Microsoft\Visual C++ for Python\9.0\VC\bin>DUMPBIN -EXPORTS d:/xfic2.dll
